title: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell
description: When attempting to export data from a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown. This bug report aims to document the issue for resolution.
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table that is located within a grid cell.
EB: When exporting data from a table within a grid cell, the software should perform this action without throwing an exception. The export operation should complete successfully.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a grid.
2. Place a table within one of the grid cells.
3. Place another table within a different grid cell.
